ARABIC: أَيَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّمَا نُمِدُّهُم بِهِۦ مِن مَّالٍ وَبَنِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Do they imagine that, in the wealth and children We extend to them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do they think that by increasing their wealth and children
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Do they fancy that Our continuing to give them wealth and children (means) that
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do they think that We are helping them by giving them children and property?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Do they assume that the wealth and sons which We provide them –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Do they think that in wealth and children with which We prolong them
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Do they think that by what We aid them with of wealth and children,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: What, do they think that We succour them with of wealth and children,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Think they that in the wealth and sons wherewith We provide them
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do they imagine that the wealth and children We have provided
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Deem they that in the wealth and sons wherewith We enlarge them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do they suppose that whatever aid We provide them in regard to wealth and children [is because]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Do they think that because We have granted them abundance of wealth and sons,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Do they think that We enlarge them in wealth and children,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do they think that in giving them wealth and children
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Do they assume that, in furnishing them with wealth and children.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Do they think that what We extend to them of wealth and children
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:55] Do they suppose that in the wealth and children with which We provide them, in the life of this world,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Think they) do the adherents of these sects think (that in the wealth and sons wherewith We provide them) in the life of this world,
